DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate use tourniquet insertion cement primary total knee arthroplasty influence clinical radiological ( measure RSA X-ray technique ) outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Stereoradiological Comparison Results After Primary Cemented Total Knee Arthroplasty Inserted With Without Use Tourniquet
